body:
Just going to keep this nice and short and readable for you :D
Well what a journey, from MCZone being my first server to now. Avicus has changed soooooo much. Well I have decided to become furthermore inactive as I don't really enjoy playing Avicus as much anymore. I haven't said anything on the forums in months and well, the community is dying (no offense). I have really enjoyed my time here though but I sadly must continue with other things. I will play occasionally but it is unlikely I will be on the forums much more at all. I have 2 more maps to submit though first :D
Anyway quick thanks to these guys:
EricV4 - Good fun and enjoyed making maps with him :P
Peachy and Kammy - Great supporters for my build server and cool to talk to
Evo and Para - Amazing map dev's helped me soooooooo much
Everyone who's been part of my build server, Fennercraft and played with me on Avicus,
The avicus community - Although it's dying it was the strongest community and good fun to be a part of

Bye everyone,
Thanks for the journey
subzero out :P

replies.body:
Well, You've been a good friend to me and all I can say is thanks. We may have just met, but I feel like we had something. I just wish you could have stayed so I could tell you what that something was. Now that your gone, I don't know what to do with my life. There a hole in my heart, where you should be, but your not. And with that fact to lead me no where, I will cry and cry and cry. Until you return to me :'(.

P.S. Cya l8r
